modName: Maddo - FXAA and Ultra ini - v2
descriptionHtml:
Added a video. Not really advertising the FXAA, but it has it enabled :P

v2 whats new?
When I made v1, I had changed settings on my graphics card, so when I was configuring v1, it would only look how I had it to me. 
v2 has been reconfigured with no changes on my graphics card, so you will be getting what I configured.

***If you want to use v1, download v2.0.1 and use the SkyrimPrefs.ini provided in that download for \'true ultra settings\'

**I did not create FXAA but have included the required files for the mod to run. The original mod was created by some_dude. Original mod:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=131

There are 2 versions, 1 standard version and 1 version with ENB\'s bug fixes, which I highly recommend.
Each version will contain a short readme which I strongly suggest you read before installing, unless you know everything about this mod.

Other mods I use:
Beautiful Skyrim
Better Bedrolls
Enhanced Blood Textures
Improved Torches Textures
Improved Water
Sparkles - Lush Environments Texture Pack
Skyrim HD - 2K Textures - Skyrim Hd 1.0.2
Skyrim Sunglare - Skyrim sunglare V1.2 HD without lens flare

Don\'t forget to take a look at [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=11]STEP - Skyrim Total Enhancement Project[/url]

If you\'re interested, here\'s a link to my old mod:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=234
author: Maddo3
